content.question: Frictional unemployment occurs when which of the following happens?

choices.label: A worker is replaced by robots on factory assembly lines.
A worker voluntarily quits a job to search for a better one.
A worker is laid off because of a downturn in economic activity.
A worker switches from working full-time to part-time.

content.answer: A worker voluntarily quits a job to search for a better one.
